response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product not only represents a significant investment but also carries a rich history and potential for future growth. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $2,000,000. I believe this is an exceptional value considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 2000000}
